text: Slip End is a medium sized village in South Bedfordshire, England. There is one school in the village - Slip End Lower School serving the community and surrounding areas from Reception to Year 4 Children. There are two community venues in the village: *The Village Hall is at the centre of the village. *Peter Edwards Hall and playing fields is adjacent to the Church, St Andrews, next to the M1 motorway. == Other websites == *Slip End official website Category:Villages in Bedfordshire
title: Slip End
